entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using the System.Text.Json source generator with ASP NET Core throws NotSupportedException when attempting to serialize IEnumerable<T> #43894
  • Generic Layout Attribute #43893
  • Add NoVaryByHost to Output Caching #43891
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #43890
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #43889
  • "IISExpress LaunchUrl" is not working #43886
  • Data Annotations Localization does not inherits the resource from base class #43885
  • ComponentBase.BuildRenderTree cannot be overriden #43883
  • asp-append-version does not work with asp-src-include if globbing is used and file paths contain whitespace. #43878
  • NavigationManager extensions: NavigateToLogin API remarks #43876
    7.0.0
  • upstream connect error or disconnect/reset before headers. reset reason: protocol error #43874
  • Viewing the entire list of registered middleware for the ASP.NET pipeline #43871
  • Opting out of Developer exception page during development #43870
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WebAssembly empty template minor issues #43869
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor Hybrid - Performance UpdateDisplayAsync #43867
  • Better diagnostics/information for circular DI dependencies in Blazor WebAssembly #43866
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes_dapper #43864
  • Better logs for not succeeded policy authentication schemes #43861
    8.0-preview1
  • Pass unmatched attributes (splat) in `<ValidationSummary />` #43860
  • Application parts manager can't ingest hubs #43859
  • Svg Bug On Blazor With Rectangles #43858

Closed

  • CookieOptions - Domain property not leading to expected behavior #43579
  • Custom SignInManager #43626
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer dependencies (Duende.IdentityServer) #41315
    7.0-rc2
  • Rate Limiting for Yarp implementations #37387
    7.0-rc2
  • IHostingEnvironment.WebRootPath is not nullable but can be null #41929
    7.0-rc2
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 1): HttpContext #42090
    7.0-rc2
  • Use custom binary serialization for output cache entries #43415
    7.0-rc2
  • Security team claims .NET 6 deleted app pools in IIS #43819
  • Improve OutputCaching vary-by API #43355
    7.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #43863
  • Build the SharedFx installer for Win-arm64 #38530
    6.0.x
  • Unable to uninstall .NET Core 2.1.30 Hosting Bundle #40955
  • Deployments Destroy All Circuits #43873
  • Make ReactDevelopmentServerMiddleware a more general-purpose middleware #43826
  • How to User Razor in a winform applications #43856
  • HAML support #43823
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43821
  • Flaky test: ProjectReferences_Graph #29213
    .NET 8 Planning
  • after parse http2 stream, how to reset #43813

PullRequests

Created

  • Add NoVaryByHost policy #43892
    area-runtime
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43882
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 6.0.x
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1edf19d` to `ec91da8` #43761
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Remove tagged keys as entries are evicted #43728
    area-runtime, ask-mode, feature-output-caching, 7.0-rc2
  • Empty template tweaks #43868
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • [release/7.0] Fix NavigationLock prerendering #43785
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43854
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 7.0-rc2
  • Use same language set for .wxl and .json files #43888
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView processing the same action multiple times #43844
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Improve error message for ByRef parameter exception #43842
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] Handle wrong type from client result #43670
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR][TS client] Send ping on connection start #43695
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] HTTP/3: Improve handling of connection timeout #43820
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Add query parameters to gRPC transcoding OpenAPI #43751
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Serialize output caching entries to binary #43672
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 7.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Add a JS initializer for the Blazor custom elements package #43809
    area-blazor
  • [7.0] Disable body streams for H2 CONNECT requests #43814
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43853
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix Path content in the Problem Details Json #43848
    area-web-frameworks
  • [7.0, Test only] Add Http/2 WebSocket HttpClient interop tests #43851
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
